FuncDef: This command assigns a specific MAC address to an Ipipe SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 48-bit MAC address in the form aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff or aa-bb-cc-dd-ee-ff where aa, bb, cc, dd, ee, and ff are hexadecimal numbers.

ExtraInfo: Default: The physical MAC address associated with the Ethernet interface where the SAP is configured.
